title: Mango muesli

ingredients.content: 260 g frozen mango, plus 180 g thawed or fresh mango, cut into cubes

preparations.content: Place coconut, almonds, dates and frozen mango into mixing bowl and chop <b>6 sec/speed 6<b>. Divide yoghurt, thawed or fresh mango and muesli between serving glasses to serve (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: The almonds and dates can be replaced with any kind of nuts and dried fruit.
You can store this muesli in the refrigerator for up to 1 day.
